headline: Marriott International Signs Multi-Unit Agreement with Corporacion Polaris and Cardedeu to Debut City Express by Marriott in El Salvador
summary: Marriott International, Inc. announced a signed multi-unit agreement with Corporacion Polaris and Cardedeu to open four City Express by Marriott properties, marking the brand's debut in El Salvador....

headline: The Purpose-Driven Traveler: New Report Reveals Shift in Asia Pacific Luxury Travel Trends
summary: A new era of luxury travel is taking shape across Asia Pacific, defined by purpose, personalization, and profound lifestyle shifts. According to a new study from the Luxury Group by Marriott International, high-net-worth (HNW) travelers in the region are recalibrating how, where, and why they travel – prioritizing wellbeing, immersive experiences, emotional value, and intentional design over volume and extravagance.
